name: tvmaze-workspace
description: Multi-repo workspace for TVMaze frontend and API

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd tvmaze && npm install && cd ../tvmaze-api && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules tvmaze/node_modules tvmaze-api/node_modules tvmaze/build tvmaze-api/dist
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:api
